price: "Transmito-vos as mensagens de meu Senhor e sou, para vós, leal conselheiro."
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
